summary: Adds map markers to the College of Winterhold professors.
descriptionHtml:
It's always annoying going in search of College professors. They might be in 5-6 different cells at any given time, often hiding behind corners or in little nooks, or in Tolfdir's case somewhere out in the wilderness. This mod adds quest markers for them, so you can buy your spells without all the aggravation.

The quest will start the first time you visit the College after passing your entrance test (and/or loading the mod for the first time). If you load the mod for the first time while already inside Winterhold, simply run down the ramp into town and then run back up again.
author: Lofgren
